titles: A discovery of the latitude of the loss of the earthly paradise by original sin. Occasioned by a disputation betwixt Mr. Matthias Rutton, min: of Boughton Munchalse in Kent, and the author hereof; branched out in these particulars, as followeth: I. First, an examination of his apologetical letter, with a full answer thereunto. II. Secondly, six arguments to prove that original sin exposed Adam and his posterity but to the first death. III. Thirdly, a discovery of the false and corrupted ministers by ten characters. IV. Fourthly, a discovery of the true ministers by ten characters. / By George Hammon, pastor to the Church of Christ meeting in Biddenden in Kent.
author: Hammon, George.
publisher: Printed by Ro: Ibbitson, for Francis Smith, and are to be sold at his shop in Flying-Horse Court in Fleetstreet,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Rutton, Matthias, 1612 or 13-1685 --  Early works to 1800.
